long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that lets you show and hide passwords in any password entry field.
It'll be available in the context menu in any input field and enabled in every input password field. You can just click on the menu item named "Toggle Password" and select "View/Hide Password"  to view or hide the password, or "Copy Password" to copy the password to the clipboard.

It can be useful if you want to copy your password or just to show it, instead of opening the browser developer tools and show it and also instead of using an unknown extension with hidden codes.

This browser extension is open-source and privacy-friendly with no hidden codes and easy-to-use by just one click.
